Title: Emerald Green
Writer: Katharina Schöde (screenplay), Felix Fuchssteiner (screenplay), Barry Thomson (author), Kerstin Gier (novel)
Actors: Kostja Ullmann, Josefine Preuß, Maria Ehrich, Jannis Niewöhner
Plot: After the events of Sapphire Blue Gwen is heartbroken and confused about who she is and what the real powers of the Raven are. Not knowing who they can trust anymore, Gwen and Leslie try to figure out what nefarious plots the Count has up his sleeve with the help of a sassy gargoyle. Using her personal chronograph Gwen attempts to discover the tightly knit secrets the Lodge has been keeping. Will Gwen be able to turn to Gideon in her time of need or is her mistrust in him justified enough to separate them forever?
